quote: A teddy bear is a hug you can hold forever! 🤗🐻
author: Emily Johnson

quote: Teddy bears don’t need hearts as they are already stuffed with love. ❤️🐻
author: Daniel Brown

quote: You are my teddy bear, always soft, warm, and cuddly. 🥰🐻
author: Sophia Wilson

quote: A teddy bear is a faithful friend you can hug anytime. 🤗💖
author: Michael Davis

quote: Just like a teddy, I’ll always be by your side, no matter what! 🐻💕
author: Olivia Martinez

quote: A teddy bear is a reminder that love is always near. ❤️🐻
author: James Anderson

quote: Hugging a teddy is like hugging happiness. 🤗💞
author: Lily Thompson

quote: May your Teddy Day be filled with warmth, love, and endless cuddles! 🥰🐻
author: Benjamin White

quote: A teddy bear is a best friend who listens with his heart. 💖🐻
author: Charlotte Hall

quote: Teddy bears make everything better—just like you do for me! 💕🐻
author: Jacob Lewis

quote: Your hug is warmer than any teddy bear in the world! 🤗💖
author: Emma Clark

quote: Let’s make memories as soft and sweet as a teddy’s hug. 🐻💞
author: William Adams

quote: Teddies are proof that even a small hug can bring immense joy. 🥰🐻
author: Grace Taylor

quote: A teddy bear is a bundle of love wrapped in fur! 💖🐻
author: Henry Scott

quote: Every hug from you feels like a teddy bear’s warmth. 🤗💞
author: Isabella Harris

quote: A teddy bear is not just a toy, it's a friend for life. 🐻💖
author: Noah Rodriguez

quote: Sending you a teddy to remind you how much I care! 🥰🐻
author: Mia Walker

quote: Teddy bears may be silent, but their hugs speak a thousand words. 💕🐻
author: Lucas Wright

quote: A teddy bear is the best companion for rainy days and lonely nights. 🌧️🐻
author: Amelia King

quote: Like a teddy, my love for you will always be soft and never-ending. 💖🐻
author: Ethan Carter
